My hometown was one of the major U.S. Air Force bases.
Actually, I wanted to become a journalist, but no matter who I imagined myself to be in the future, somehow I was sure: I would leave my hometown. I felt it was my destiny.
It feels good when your hometown supports you, and Macon's always done that with us. Every time we come here, it's an event - which is nice.
